title: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the File Type
description: The icon has also changed from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB:
1) Open an existing java file
2) Modify it (e.g. move an existing class)
3) Click the SaveAs icon located next to the Save Icon
4) In the dialog that appears, browse for a valid container location
5) Type the filename without the extension
6) Click Ok

Observed Behavior:
The file is added to the specified location in the Navigator, but no file extension is shown.
EB:
The file is now treated as a generic file and will be opened as text. 

Expected Behavior:
The file should be saved with the same extension as the original file, unless explicitly changed.
SR:
1) Open an existing java file
2) Modify the file
3) Click the SaveAs icon
4) Browse for a container location
5) Enter a filename without the extension
6) Click Ok
